description: Information on all transmission facility applications (new tower or attachments) filed with the Montgomery County Cable Office for telecommunications and radio & TV transmission sites, including the location of the tower and the disposition of the application.  This dataset will be updated on a quarterly basis.

name: Transmission Facilities Application Status & Location
